meanings.definition: Software that enables multiple users to work together on a project or task.
meanings.sent1: Our office uses groupware to collaborate on important presentations.
meanings.sent2: The team relied on groupware to complete the project efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The groupware made it easy for everyone to contribute their ideas.
meanings.sent4: Using groupware is like having a virtual meeting room for teamwork.
meanings.sent5: With groupware, teamwork becomes seamless and productive.

meanings.definition: Collaborative software that facilitates communication and coordination among a group of people.
meanings.sent1: The company implemented groupware to improve team communication.
meanings.sent2: Groupware allows team members to share files and ideas effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: We all enjoy using groupware to stay connected and organized.
meanings.sent4: Groupware acts as a digital hub for team interactions and updates.
meanings.sent5: Thanks to groupware, our group projects are now much smoother.
